description: M i s c e l l a n y   ( D a v i d   b e n   J o s h u a   b e n   A b r a h a m   M a i m o n i d e s ' s   a l - M u r s h i d   i l a ́   a l - t a f a r u d   v ̣ a - a l - m u r f i d   i l a ́   a l - t a g   a r u d ;   I b n   G a b i r o l ' s   T i ḳ u n   m i d o t   h a - n e f e s h   i n   J u d a e o - A r a b i c   t r a n s l a t i o n )
title: Miscellany (David ben Joshua ben Abraham Maimonides's al-Murshid ilá al-tafarud ṿa-al-murfid ilá al-tag arud; Ibn Gabirol's Tiḳun midot ha-nefesh in Judaeo-Arabic translation)
